casebody.data:
No. 249,

October Term, 1966.

Walker et al. v. City of Birmingham, Joseph B. Robison for American Jewish Congress; J. M. Breckenridge and Earl McBee for respondent in opposition. J. Albert Woll, Laurence Gold and Thomas E. Harris for American Federation of Labor & Congress of Industrial Organizations.

388 U. S. 307. Motions of American Jewish Congress and American Federation of Labor & Congress of Industrial Organizations for leave to file briefs, as amici curiae, in support of petition granted. Petition for rehearing denied.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of these motions and petition.
